medical_history.chief_complaint: Diffuse abdominal pain localized to the right lower quadrant.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began one day prior with diffuse abdominal pain that worsened over the last 6 hours, becoming localized to the right lower quadrant. The pain intensified with movement and abdominal straining. Patient reported mild nausea and anorexia, with normal bowel movements both yesterday and today. Denies fever, chills, night sweats, or urinary symptoms.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Type II Diabetes Mellitus (last A1c reported to be 8%), history of Hepatitis B (last viral load undetectable).
